column3: (Vulnerable JS Library - may flag bundled libs with known but unexploitable CVEs)
(Re-examine Cache-control Directives - noisy for API endpoints)
(Storable and Cacheable Content - API responses are intentionally cacheable)
(Cookie Without SameSite - FastAPI/Starlette cookie config is handled in middleware)
(Timestamp Disclosure - health endpoint returns timing info by design)
(Dangerous JS Functions - false positives in minified bundles)
(Absence of Anti-CSRF Tokens - JWT-based auth doesn't use CSRF tokens)
(Proxy Disclosure - only relevant behind nginx in production)
(Insecure JSF ViewState - not applicable, no JSF)
